allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Clean slate for resale: Remove user data, rebrand to JSEEKA

- Remove all personal data \(leads, emails, contacts, campaigns\)
- Remove scripts and archived files
- Rebrand AI from JARVIS to JSEEKA in UI
- Clear default settings \(no KnowYourVIP branding\)
- New password set for access
- Clean data folder with .gitkeep

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
